column4: FYI even "purge" won't touch config files in a home directory
that's why i mentioned there too
do you have anything installed in wine that you care about?  if you don't, just delete your ~/.wine folder - problem solved ;)
remove evolution will remove the ubuntu-desktop metapackage... can cause issues, especially if trying to update.
well not really - but i see your point
if it's buggy without ubuntu-desktop, that'd be bugs, yes?
minimal is debian without Ubuntu stuff, why not just install Debian?
i like ubuntu, i just don't want some of the apps -desktop depends on. like bluetooth stuff. my comp doesn't even support it
if you're using gnome, I'm really not surprised.  Best of luck.
yeah, there is that, but it is a good player
why do people still use numeric-form permissions when you can chmod +r, etc?
